A[i] = 1 1 1 1  Mapping I/O Identities to SSLOs
      1:  procedure MAPPER(IOIID, IOClasses, SSLOs, thresh)
        2:      L set S be an arr with len IOClasses.len * SSLOs.len
        3:      for IOClass = IOClasses do
          4:          for SSLO = SSLOs do
            5:             f(- fitness(IOID,IOClass)
            6:             c(- convergence(IOClass,SSLO) )
            7:             S[IOClass,SSLO] <- f*c
          8:             end for
          9:          end for
        10:        return highest-ranked(SSLO, IOClass) pair in S
      11:  end procedure

<!-- end procedure -->
